---
title: "Donate"
---

The **Data Science Learning Community** is a fiscally sponsored collective within the [Open Collective Foundation](https://opencollective.foundation/).

The [Open Collective Foundation is dissolving](https://blog.opencollective.com/open-collective-official-statement-ocf-dissolution/), and we are actively seeking a new fiscal sponsor.
If you are interested in sponsoring the Data Science Learning Community, please [contact us](mailto:rfordatasci@gmail.com)!

Would you like to support the Data Science Learning Community? 
You can make a tax-deductible donation to help us continue our work through the [Open Collective](https://opencollective.com/r4ds).
